name: Toof saves Christmas
description:
Toof saves christmas is made for Jame Gam 2021 Christmas edition.

You play as toof, using wasd arrow keys and the spacebar to move around.

Collect fabric, wool and thread to make santas hat and wear it to become powerfull enough to defeat krampus

Credits:

Art: SmellyLemonade

Music: Markositta, https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIMguYTK_0TqHk6PALKWfWw

Programming: luminousEye
